item.title: Player items
item.dc:creator: @puffcake puffcake
item.description:
@puffcake wrote:

ok so i have this so far for my new xmas event

if(objectID == 2566){ if(playerHasItem(7478, 100)); deleteItem(7478, 100); addItem(Item.randomChristmas(), 1); addItem(Item.randomRunes(),misc.random(200)); addItem(995, misc.random(200000)); }

how do i make it so you must have the item 7478 i forget what it is its some with if playerhasitem or something i believe

Read full topic
